article.title: Three Years of Melodrama
article.author: Eric Bai
article.excerpt: To celebrate Lorde's album Melodrama, I made a webpage adaptation of the lyrics booklet that comes with the physical CD.

authors.bio: A Canadian software engineer in New York. I watch a lot of movies.
authors.name: Eric Bai
